channel.title: About the Gauntlet Community category
channel.description: For general discussion of the Gauntlet Gaming Community, as well as Gauntlet-created content like our blog, podcasts, and Gauntlet Community Open Gaming. *(Not for miscellaneous/general discussions nor finding players.)*
